programme.title: Amazing Hotels: Life Beyond The Lobby S1
programme.desc: In the second episode of this eye-opening series, Giles Coren and Monica Galetti head to the Andean Cloud Forest of Ecuador to work at Mashpi Lodge, a $10-million modernist hotel featuring an extraordinary gondola cable car that 'flies' guests one mile through the jungle canopy at a dizzying height. The hotel was built by a former mayor of capital Quito on the site of what was once a logging station.

Yaya's disobedience results in a tummy upset and she learns her lesson about being obedient to one's parents.

programme.title: Marblegen
programme.desc: In a world where marble play has become one of the most popular sports, Marblegens tournaments, magical marbles with extraordinary powers, are all the rage. Forming the Meteor team, Assa, Cosmo, Luna and Sam decided to participate in the Olympia MARBLEGAMES, one of the biggest tournaments on the planet! Their objective: to prevent the terrible Marcellus King from seizing the powerful Mercury ball, a reward offered to the winners.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S12

programme.title: Make It Count
programme.desc: Joakim and Charmian go to the world class Singapore Zoo to hunt down Math in Nature. They go in search of plants that divide, count and add (though not out loud), wild dogs and lionesses that use Math to help them decide to hunt or fight and cicadas that count on prime numbers to avoid predators. There's even a mathematical explanation to why ants are strong, polar bears are big and elephants live so long. Mother Nature is a master mathematician. And we have the proof!

programme.title: Pfffirates
programme.desc: On Calypso Island, three crews are taught Pfffiracy by the legendary Captain Lamar. This tough training program ranges from sailing exercises and treasure hunting competitions to cannon firing and accosting enemy ships! But it would take more than that for Pat, Lily or Stede to give up. When a Pfffirate has friends to count on, nothing is impossible!
